attributes.action: Change the MP selection process and scrap second home allowances replacing it with government run halls of residence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sack MPs from all Parties who have been exposed by expenses fiddles. 

Select new MPs by the Jurerer selection process and change the term of office to One year only. 

Scrap the second home allowance. 

Accomodate MPs in Government run and expensed halls of residence near Westminster which each MP can use in London free on parliament business only.

rejection.details:
Government does not control who sits in Parliament. That is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
There is an existing petition on creating a halls of residence for MPs: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Stop-MP-Expenses/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
